metadata.name: ℍ𝕠𝕦𝕤𝕖 𝕠�� 𝔻𝕣𝕖𝕒𝕞𝕖𝕣𝕤
metadata.description:
Open your eyes slowly, and look up at the sky. Smile, even when you keep failing. Push your vulnerabilities away, do it all over again. You try to surpass yourself, to run after your ideals. Have faith in your mind, don't let your soul go blank. Open up the windows of your heart: I can already see the world at your feet.
 
Animation and music by Yu Cai
